item.description:
Harvey has Generously let us have a party at his Boat. Bring what you make best. When You RSVP please let us know. This will be limited to 20 people because the Marina only hold so many. Car Pooling is incouraged. The boat is down in the Chester/ Essex area.
!!!!!Attention Direction!!!!!!!
Tha Name of the marina is Hayes Haven Slip #13 Remember to obey the speed limit or you and Harvey will get banishedBanished from the Marina Forever.
Directions from Hartford are
Rte 9 to exit 7 Its a long exit.
Take a right off the exit onto RTE 154
Go down the road till you pass RTE 148 Just passed 148 on the left is Groute Road
take the left onto groute Rd the marina is on the left after the railrod tracks.

BYOB BLender Provided so if you like margaritas Pina Colada, and Diquris bring the mix and definately lots of ice. If you can change you RSVP to say what you will bring I woul love that!!!!!!!! Just so there are duplicates. Thanks Sandy

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Boat Party At Harveys Boat
